page.title: 15MINEHEAD LIBRARY
page.content: The library is in Bancks Street.There are 20,000 books altogether in the library.About 400 people borrow books each day.There are children's books ,adult fiction and non fiction books.Adult fiction is the most popular.Reference books cannot be borrowed."The Times" and local newspapers can be found in the library.They cannot be borrowed .Some books are sold.To borrow a book you must become a member.If you are over 14 years old you fill in a form and get a ticket.If you are under 14 an adult must fill in the form.You may borrow 4 books at a time with your ticket.There are 7,624 members. Hours of opening :Monday 9.30-6.00 Tuesday 9.30-6.00 Thursday 9.30-6.00 Friday 9.30-7.30 Saturday 9.30-4.00
